EmailTemplate.name: AERO_GDPR_Data_Management_mih.AERO_2019_Confirmation_SingleOptIn_mih
EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome to Honeywell Aerospace
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> Subscription Confirmation Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}},
You have successfully subscribed to marketing communications* from Honeywell International Inc., its affiliates, subsidiaries, third parties that distribute our products and other trusted business partners.
That means you’ll be able to get exclusive updates about offerings, news and events, surveys, special offers and related topics.
Can’t wait? Check our website here. <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> You can change your preferences <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/AERO_Preference_Center.html]]> at any time.
Thank you,
Honeywell Aerospace
*Marketing communications refers to communications about offerings, news and events, surveys, special offers, and related topics via telephone, email, and other forms of electronic communication (e.g., communications through social media platforms).
If you no longer wish to receive these emails, click on the following link: Unsubscribe <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/u/hq0pk0I00Q0000GnZ020XI0]]>
